channel.title: Abouts on Aikido
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Aikido

item.title: Grading
item.description: The grading will happen twice per year. Dan grading will be done once per year with the help of Stefan Stenudd. The grades will be Aikikai grades. Requirements/Techniques per Grade coming soon

item.title: Links
item.description: Aikido Enighet in Malm√∂ Aikikai Hombu Dojo in Tokio

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Subject Message Submit × Yes, the contact form works. I'll get an email, when you press Send. Please don't spam me!

item.title: Impressum
item.description: site author: Stephan Schroeder 55 St. Augustines Rd NW1 9RR London UK

item.title: Privacy Notice
item.description: No cookies, no tracking and no data is created/saved for future marketing. The contact message is send via AWS Lambda, but no data is retained (or even logs created), apart from the email in the dojos inbox, which is deleted after it has been answered.

item.title: Schedule & Address
item.description: × Site Under Construction! Adress and Schedule are only placeholder and not real! Adress Map tiles by Stamen Design, under CC BY 3.0. Data by OpenStreetMap, under ODbL. 42 Made Up Rd N0W ERE London Price first class is free x$ per week y$ per month Schedule Tuesday19:30-20:30 Thursday19:30-20:30 Saturday10:00-12:00 Opening Soon! Late 2019 or early 2020. If you have questions feel free to use the contact form
